General.Name: Foxx Development Holdings Inc.
General.Description: Foxx Development Holdings Inc. operates as a consumer electronics and integrated internet-of-things (IoT) solution company in the United States. The company offers smartphones, tablets, wearables, and other communication terminals under the Foxx brand. It also provides after-sales support services. The company serves third-party distributors and sales agents through retail and online stores. Foxx Development Holdings Inc. is headquartered in Irvine, California.
General.Address: 13575 Barranca Parkway, Irvine, CA, United States, 92618
